Entertainment Sites (Anime, Manga, TV, Movie, Music)
====================================================

https://theindex.moe - Updated indexs of free Anime, Manga, Hentai and LN sites done by r/animepiracy

https://wotaku.pages.dev - Updated databases of finding free Anime, Manga, Hentai and LN sites

https://ripped.guide - Database to find Anime, manga, games, music and mobile apps
